definition: hired (for employment)/invited (e.g. to lecture)/engaged (for a task)/(in olden times) betrothal gift from the groom's family
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to engage (a teacher etc)/to hire/to betroth/betrothal gift/to get married (of woman)

sentences.english: When candidates describe what they did, don't assume it was done well.
sentences.chinese: 當受聘人描述他們所做的，不要認爲他們做的很好。

sentences.english: While IQ gets you hired, EQ gets you promoted.
sentences.chinese: 你因智商受聘，因情商升遷。

sentences.english: After two years she decided to move to the South and successfully applied for a position at Nanguo Business College.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後她決定遷往南方，最後順利受聘於南國商學院。

sentences.english: The appointee will be required to work irregular hours subject to operational needs.
sentences.chinese: 受聘人將須因應運作需要而不定時工作。

sentences.english: The consultant hired suggested linking up with the business community.
sentences.chinese: 受聘的諮詢顧問建議與商業界攜手合作。

sentences.english: The engaged party agrees to all the articles in this contract.
sentences.chinese: 受聘方同意本合同的各項條款。

sentences.english: The engaged party works five days a week and seven hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 受聘方的工作時間每週五天，每天七小時。

sentences.english: In 2002 the University employed in any of elderly Tai Chi Peng City coach ever since.
sentences.chinese: 2002年受聘於彭州市老年大學任太極拳教練至今。

sentences.english: As an admissions expert, he was employed by the Shanghai Armed Police Corps Hospital of Dermatology.
sentences.chinese: 曾受聘武警上海總隊醫院皮膚科坐診專家。

sentences.english: Take a look at this chart, which shows the number of people employed in the broad category of ‘editors’.
sentences.chinese: 下面這張圖表顯示了更廣義範圍受聘“編輯”的人數。

sentences.english: Workers were re-employed after the layoff.
sentences.chinese: 暫時解僱不久後，工人們又再度受聘。

sentences.english: Normally, appointees will be required to work no more than 18 hours per week.
sentences.chinese: 在一般情況下，受聘人每星期工作不多於18小時。

sentences.english: Party A fails to pay remuneration for Party B on time.
sentences.chinese: 聘方未按時支付受聘方報酬。

sentences.english: Party B shall bear all expenses incurred when staying on after the contract expires.
sentences.chinese: 受聘方合同期滿後，在華逗留期間的一切費用自理。

sentences.english: To be employed as counselors-at-law for the government and its functional departments.
sentences.chinese: 受聘擔任政府及其職能部門法律顧問。

sentences.english: He was employed to teach in Shanghai Fine Arts School, and later worked concurrently as director of the second Correspondence department.
sentences.chinese: 受聘執教於上海圖畫美術院，後兼任函授乙部主任。
